original_text: And the slain shall fall in the midst of you, and ye shall know that I am the Lord.
korean_text: 또 너희가 죽임을 당하여 엎드러지게 하여 내가 여호와인 줄을 너희가 알게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: And the slain shall fall in the midst of you
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 죽임 당한 자들이 너희 가운데서 쓰러질 것이며

sentences.original_text: and ye shall know that I am the Lord
